SqlResource.Select: SELECT [Id],[CreateTime],[LastUpdateTime],[NewVersionInfoId],[NewId] ,[ProductBusinessClass],[ProductInfoState],[DistributionPercent],[MonthOfShelfLife] ,[Desc_OwnProductType] OwnProductType,[Desc_ProductNo] ProductNo,[Desc_BrandName] BrandName,[Desc_ProductName] ProductName,[Desc_Specifications] Specifications ,[Desc_Category] Category,[Desc_PackageQuantity] PackageQuantity,[Desc_PackageUnit] PackageUnit,[Desc_SubCategory] SubCategory,[Desc_OldCategory] OldCategory FROM [dbo].[ProductInfo] WITH(NOLOCK)
SqlResource.Insert: INSERT INTO dbo.ProductInfo ( Id ,Desc_ProductNo ,Desc_BrandName ,Desc_ProductName ,Desc_Specifications , CreateTime ,LastUpdateTime ,Desc_Category ,Desc_PackageQuantity ,Desc_PackageUnit , Desc_SubCategory ,NewVersionInfoId ,NewId ,Desc_OwnProductType ,ProductBusinessClass , ProductInfoState ,DistributionPercent ,Desc_OldCategory ,MonthOfShelfLife ) VALUES (@Id ,@Desc_ProductNo ,@Desc_BrandName ,@Desc_ProductName ,@Desc_Specifications , GETDATE() ,GETDATE() ,@Desc_Category ,@Desc_PackageQuantity ,@Desc_PackageUnit , @Desc_SubCategory ,@NewVersionInfoId ,@NewId ,@Desc_OwnProductType ,@ProductBusinessClass , @ProductInfoState ,@DistributionPercent ,@Desc_OldCategory ,@MonthOfShelfLife)
